Node.Name: 审批
Node.Condition_In: EXECUTIVEDIRECTORCONTENT is not null

Node.Name: 保留
Node.Condition_In: FINANCEDIRECTORID IS NOT NULL
Node.Condition_Out: FINANCEDIRECTORCONTENT IS NOT NULL AND FINANCEDIRECTORTIME IS NOT NULL

Node.Name: 所属总经理审批
Node.Condition_In: GENERALMANAGERID IS NOT NULL
Node.Condition_Out: GENERALMANAGERCONTENT IS NOT NULL AND GENERALMANAGERTIME IS NOT NULL

Node.Name: 执行董事审批
Node.Condition_In: EXECUTIVEDIRECTORID IS NOT NULL
Node.Condition_Out: EXECUTIVEDIRECTORCONTENT IS NOT NULL AND EXECUTIVEDIRECTORTIME IS NOT NULL

Node.Name: 部门负责人审批
Node.Condition_In: DEPARTMENTLEADERID IS NOT NULL
Node.Condition_Out: DEPARTMENTLEADERCONTENT IS NOT NULL AND DEPARTMENTLEADERTIME IS NOT NULL

Node.Name: 分管领导审批
Node.Condition_In: CHARGELEADERID IS NOT NULL
Node.Condition_Out: CHARGELEADERCONTENT IS NOT NULL AND CHARGELEADERTIME IS NOT NULL

Node.Name: 执行董事审批
Node.Condition_In: select * from OA_FinancePayWFA where 1=1 and state=0 and money >= 10000 and id ={YWID}

Node.Name: 出纳审批
Node.Condition_In: SELECT * FROM oa_bizroute ob,OA_FinancePayWFA oa WHERE oa.state = 0 AND ( ExecutiveDirectorStatus = 1 Or oa.Money < 10000) and oa.id=ob.id_ywid and id ={YWID}

Node.Name: 执行董事审批
Node.Condition_In: select * from WorkflowAction_FinanceExpense where 1=1 and state=0 and money >10000 and id={YWID}

Node.Name: 出纳审批
Node.Condition_In: SELECT * FROM oa_bizroute ob, WorkflowAction_FinanceExpense oa WHERE oa.state = 0 AND ( ob.ExecutiveDirectorStatus = 1 Or oa.Money <= 10000 ) and oa.id=ob.id_ywid and id ={YWID}

Node.Name: 执行董事审批
Node.Condition_In: select * from OA_FinanceBizTripExpenseWFA where 1=1 and state=0 and money >10000 and id ={YWID}

Node.Name: 出纳审批
Node.Condition_In: SELECT * FROM oa_bizroute ob,OA_FinanceBizTripExpenseWFA oa WHERE oa.state = 0 AND ( ob.ExecutiveDirectorStatus = 1 Or oa.Money <= 10000) and oa.id=ob.id_ywid and id ={YWID}

Node.Name: 分管领导审批
Node.Condition_In: select * from OA_BusinessTripApplication where 1=1 and state=0 and expenseActual >= 10000 and id ={YWID}

Node.Name: 执行董事审批
Node.Condition_In: select * from OA_BusinessTripApplication oa , oa_bizroute ob where 1=1 and state=0 and ob.ChargeLeaderStatus = 1 and oa.expenseActual>=50000 and id ={YWID}

Node.Name: 会计审核
Node.Condition_In: SELECT * FROM oa_bizroute ob,OA_BusinessTripApplication oa WHERE oa.state = 0 AND ( oa.expenseActual < 10000 OR ( ob.ExecutiveDirectorStatus = 1 AND oa.expenseActual >= 50000 ) OR (ob.ChargeLeaderStatus = 1 and oa.expenseActual >=10000 and oa.expenseActual <50000)) and oa.id=ob.id_ywid and id ={YWID}

Node.Name: 兑付申请
Node.Condition_In: SELECT * FROM oa_bizroute WHERE id_ywid ={YWID} AND ( DepartmentLeaderId != '' AND DepartmentLeaderStatus = 2 OR ChargeLeaderId != '' AND ChargeLeaderStatus = 2 )

Node.Name: 部门负责人审核
Node.Condition_In: SELECT * FROM oa_bizroute WHERE id_ywid ={YWID} AND (ChargeLeaderId ='' or ChargeLeaderStatus = '2')

Node.Name: 分管领导审批
Node.Condition_In: SELECT * FROM oa_bizroute WHERE id_ywid = {YWID} AND DepartmentLeaderId !='' and DepartmentLeaderStatus !=2

Node.Name: 执行董事审批
Node.Condition_In: select * from OA_BorrowMoney where state=0 and id={YWID} and money >= 50000

Node.Name: 会计审核
Node.Condition_In: SELECT * FROM oa_bizroute ob,OA_BorrowMoney oa WHERE oa.state = 0 AND ( oa.money < 50000 OR ob.ExecutiveDirectorStatus = 1 ) and oa.id=ob.id_ywid and id ={YWID}

Node.Name: 副总裁审批
Node.Condition_In: select * from WorkflowAction_FinanceExpense where 1=1 and state=0 and money >2000 and id={YWID}

Node.Name: 执行董事审批
Node.Condition_In: select * from WorkflowAction_FinanceExpense where 1 = 1 and state = 0 and money > 20000 and id={YWID}

Node.Name: 出纳审批
Node.Condition_In: SELECT * FROM oa_bizroute ob, WorkflowAction_FinanceExpense oa WHERE oa.state = 0 AND ( ob.ExecutiveDirectorStatus = 1 or (ob.GeneralManagerStatus = 1 and oa.Money <= 20000) or oa.Money <= 2000) and oa.id=ob.id_ywid and id ={YWID}

Node.Name: 副总裁审批
Node.Condition_In: select * from OA_FinanceBizTripExpenseWFA where 1=1 and state=0 and money >2000 and id={YWID}

Node.Name: 执行董事审批
Node.Condition_In: select * from OA_FinanceBizTripExpenseWFA where 1 = 1 and state = 0 and money > 20000 and id={YWID}

Node.Name: 出纳审批
Node.Condition_In: SELECT * FROM oa_bizroute ob, OA_FinanceBizTripExpenseWFA oa WHERE oa.state = 0 AND ( ob.ExecutiveDirectorStatus = 1 or (ob.GeneralManagerStatus = 1 and oa.Money <= 20000) or oa.Money <= 2000) and oa.id=ob.id_ywid and id ={YWID}

Node.Name: 副总裁审批
Node.Condition_In: select * from OA_FinancePayWFA where 1=1 and state=0 and money >2000 and id={YWID}

Node.Name: 执行董事审批
Node.Condition_In: select * from OA_FinancePayWFA where 1=1 and state=0 and money > 20000 and id ={YWID}

Node.Name: 出纳审批
Node.Condition_In: SELECT * FROM oa_bizroute ob, OA_FinancePayWFA oa WHERE oa.state = 0 AND ( ob.ExecutiveDirectorStatus = 1 or (ob.GeneralManagerStatus = 1 and oa.Money <= 20000) or oa.Money <= 2000) and oa.id=ob.id_ywid and id ={YWID}
